details.text: Platform interface logic.
Global interconnect for 4 global loads and 1 global store. Reduce number of global loads and stores to simplify global interconnect.
See %L for more information

details.Additional information: Requested size 2000 bytes, implemented size 2048 bytes, stall-free, 1 read and 1 write.

details.text: Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.

Additional information.text: Requested size 32768 bytes, implemented size 32768 bytes, stall-free, 2 reads and 2 writes.
Reducing accesses to exactly one read and one write for all on-chip memory systems may increase overall system performance.

details.text: Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.

Additional information.text: Requested size 4096 bytes, implemented size 4096 bytes, stall-free, 2 reads and 1 write.
Reducing accesses to exactly one read and one write for all on-chip memory systems may increase overall system performance.

details.text: Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.

details.Clock: Running memory at 2x clock to support more concurrent ports

Additional information.text: Requested size 4096 bytes, implemented size 36864 bytes, replicated 9 times total, stall-free, 20 reads and 3 writes.
Replicated 9 times to efficiently support multiple accesses. To reduce this replication factor, reduce number of read and write accesses.
